alert.note: Alert for Maunabo; Patillas; San Lorenzo; Yabucoa (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 06 at 5:39AM AST until February 06 at 7:15AM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 AM AST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by continued periods of heavy rains with excessive runoff is expected. * WHERE...Portion of Caguas, Cayey, Cidra, Maunabo, Patillas, San Lorenzo and Yabucoa. * WHEN...Until 730 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways and in poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 539 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
